title: Kolkata doctor rape-murder case: All you need to know
selftext: This is an issue that the whole country should be aware of, it's Nirbhaya 2.0 but for some reason only doctors are aware of this incident. Please share it with everyone you know
comments: What's the heck is this civics volunteer? What do they do who recruit them on what basis? Are these the so called hospital agents skimming ignorant patients and their families?

This country is sooo fucked , These basterds need to be beheaded on Red fort every 15th of August .
We need some Saudi Arabia type system here , fear of getting killed on live telivision is the only thing that can keep these animals under control.

At this point this country's citizens have absolutely zero unity and respect. This country needs a revolution in many cases and the main concern is safety. We've ignored trafficking successfully for a decade and now even when our women are getting raped, tormented and then brutally killed by torture worse than death, we're trying to ignore it too. 

We failed as a society, we failed as humans, we are much worse than the monsters we've read about.
